products.name: Aspirin
products.description: Aspirin is used to reduce fever and relieve mild to moderate pain from conditions such as muscle aches, toothaches, and common cold.
products.dosage: Take 1 tablet with a full glass of water every 4 to 6 hours as needed.

products.name: Lisinopril
products.description: Lisinopril is used to treat high blood pressure. Lowering high blood pressure helps prevent strokes, heart attacks, and kidney problems.
products.dosage: Take this medication by mouth with or without food as directed by your doctor, usually once or twice daily.

products.name: Metoprolol
products.description: Metoprolol is used to treat high blood pressure. It works by blocking the action of certain natural chemicals in your body, such as epinephrine, on the heart and blood vessels.
products.dosage: Take this medication by mouth, with or right after a meal, as directed by your doctor, usually 1-3 times a day.

products.name: Ventolin
products.description: Ventolin is used to treat wheezing and shortness of breath caused by breathing problems such as asthma. It is also used to prevent asthma brought on by exercise.
products.dosage: Follow the directions on your prescription label. Do not use this medicine in larger or smaller amounts or for longer than recommended.

products.name: Advair
products.description: Advair is used to prevent asthma attacks and to treat chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD).
products.dosage: Use Advair exactly as prescribed by your doctor. Follow all directions on your prescription label.

products.name: Spiriva
products.description: Spiriva is used to treat chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), including chronic bronchitis and emphysema.
products.dosage: Use Spiriva exactly as prescribed by your doctor. Follow all directions on your prescription label.

products.name: Tylenol
products.description: Tylenol is used to treat many conditions such as headache, muscle aches, arthritis, backache, toothaches, colds, and fevers.
products.dosage: Take this medication by mouth as directed by your doctor. You may take this drug with or without food.

products.name: Ibuprofen
products.description: Ibuprofen is used to relieve pain from various conditions such as headache, dental pain, menstrual cramps, muscle aches, or arthritis.
products.dosage: Take ibuprofen by mouth with or without food, usually every 4 to 6 hours as directed by your doctor.

products.name: Naproxen
products.description: Naproxen is used to relieve pain from various conditions such as headache, muscle aches, tendonitis, dental pain, and menstrual cramps.
products.dosage: Take this medication by mouth as directed by your doctor, usually twice daily with or without food.

products.name: Amoxicillin
products.description: Amoxicillin is used to treat a wide variety of bacterial infections. It works by stopping the growth of bacteria.
products.dosage: Take this medication by mouth with or without food as directed by your doctor, usually every 8 or 12 hours.

products.name: Azithromycin
products.description: Azithromycin is used to treat a wide variety of bacterial infections. It is a macrolide-type antibiotic.
products.dosage: Take this medication by mouth as directed by your doctor, usually once daily with or without food.

products.name: Ciprofloxacin
products.description: Ciprofloxacin is used to treat a variety of bacterial infections. It belongs to a class of drugs called quinolone antibiotics.
products.dosage: Take this medication by mouth with or without food as directed by your doctor, usually twice a day.

products.name: Claritin
products.description: Claritin is used to relieve allergy symptoms such as watery eyes, runny nose, itching eyes/nose, sneezing, hives, and itching.
products.dosage: Take this medication by mouth with or without food as directed by your doctor, usually once daily.

products.name: Zyrtec
products.description: Zyrtec is used to relieve allergy symptoms such as watery eyes, runny nose, itching eyes/nose, sneezing, hives, and itching.
products.dosage: Take this medication by mouth with or without food as directed by your doctor, usually once daily.

products.name: Allegra
products.description: Allegra is used to relieve allergy symptoms such as watery eyes, runny nose, itching eyes/nose, sneezing, hives, and itching.
products.dosage: Take this medication by mouth with or without food as directed by your doctor, usually once daily.
